ygData.subject: RE: Re: Info Needed on items Spoilers are Accepted and  wanted
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Quest all based in mistmoore ... Lower guk off ghoul lord, level 47 or 48, has 2 harm touches about 480dmg each, 2 level 45 to 46 guards. Need minimum 6
ygData.messageBody:
>Electrum Bladed Wakazashi

Quest all based in mistmoore

>Short Sword of the Ykesha

Lower guk off ghoul lord, level 47 or 48, has 2 harm touches about 480dmg
each, 2 level 45 to 46 guards. Need minimum 6 level 45 to 50 players with
enchanter or 10 to 12 level 45 to 50 without enchanter.

Mithril Armor

Solusek B, chest off kobold priest, bracers off kobold king. Arms and legs
also available but most likely on named fire giants which require multiple
groups, though that is just a guess.

Adamantite Armor

only know of epolets (shoulders) from lower guk, good for hybrid casters
(add wisdom)

Shada Silverleaf, Level 50 Bard, Mithaniel Marr
Erisi, Level 14 Paladin, Mithaniel Marr
